Common Item Curses
d%Curse
01–15Delusion
16–35Opposite effect or target
36–45Intermittent functioning
46–60Requirement
61–75Drawback
76–90Completely different effect
91–100Substitute specific cursed item on the Specific Cursed Items table

name: Common Item Curses
